div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1674 Kasr el Danar (= Kafr el Dawar), (538) 20 km. E of Alexandria?, before 1905 Burial: 325-300 B.C.? (Jenkins) Contents: 1700 AR Alexander III: tetradr. Disposition: unknown Edd√©, Boll. di Num. 1905, p. 529, 140 (no details) Cf. Demanhur hd. (no. 1664); perhaps part of it ?
